DOC.brief_title: A Modified Approach Morbid Obese With Gynecologic Cancer
DOC.criteria: 1 . Resectable ( ovarian , endometrial , cervical ) cancer . 2 . Anaesthetically fit ( ASA 1 2 ) . 3 . Abdominal pannus symphysis pubis . 1 . Non resectable gynecologic cancer . 2 . Unfit patient . 3 . Patients refuse share trial .
